item.title: Reproduction: Timmer, M. P., Dietzenbacher, E., Los, B., Stehrer, R., & De Vries, G. J. (2015). An illustrated user guide to the world inputâ€“output database: the case of global automotive production.
item.description: Load libraries and data Timmer et al. (2015) use 2013 vintage of world input-output database (WIOD). The following code downloads the data from the homepage, unzips it and loads it into R. Before you download the data please note that the file has a size of about 250 MB. So make sure you have enought space on your disc before you download it. # Download WIOD 2013 download.file("http://www.wiod.org/protected3/data13/update_sep12/wiot/wiot_stata_sep12.zip", destfile = "wiod13.
